title: Price ceiling above Peq, no surplus or shortage

content.question: The graph above shows the supply and demand curves for gasoline. Which of the following will occur if the government establishes a price ceiling of $1.20 per gallon?

choices.label: Neither a surplus nor a shortage

content.answer: Neither a surplus nor a shortage

topic.text: 2.8: The Effects of Government Intervention in Markets

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
